pages.title: Titanium
pages.text: Titanium is a resource that naturally generates in the overworld, from Y level -64 up to Y level -16.$(br)Tools and armor forged out of this material are more durable than diamond, but not as strong or fast.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)VERY HIGH$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)7$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)6$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)MODERATE
Raw Titanium can be smelted into ingots either by a Furnace or a Blast Furnace. Tools and armor must be crafted using individual pieces of Titanium.
